title: JNUG ETF Stock Price & Overview
text: Direxion Daily Junior Gold Miners Index Bull 2X Shares (JNUG) About JNUG Fund Home PageThe Direxion Daily Junior Gold Miners Index Bull 2X Shares (JNUG) is an exchange-traded fund that is based on the MVIS Global Junior Gold Miners index. The fund provides daily 2x exposure to an index of junior gold and silver mining companies from developed as well as emerging markets. JNUG was launched on Oct 3, 2013 and is issued by Direxion. Top 10 Holdings 119.16% of assetsDividend History Performance JNUG had a total return of 469.73% in the past year, including dividends. Since the fund's inception, the average annual return has been -32.89%.
